pages.about: About Us - Luxe Oasis Hotel 18+ Home About Us Casino Contacts About Us Home | About Us Our History Luxe Oasis Hotel was established in 2000, aiming to redefine luxury hospitality. Over the years, we have evolved, offering our guests a blend of timeless elegance and modern amenities. Our journey began with a vision to create a sanctuary of comfort and sophistication in the heart of the city. Our Values At Luxe Oasis Hotel, our values are the cornerstone of our success. We prioritize excellence, integrity, and customer satisfaction in everything we do. Our commitment to sustainability and community engagement reflects our dedication to making a positive impact on the world around us. Excellence in Service Integrity and Transparency Sustainability and Eco-Friendliness Community Engagement Our Team Meet the passionate professionals who make Luxe Oasis Hotel a premier destination. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service and creating memorable experiences for our guests. John Smith General Manager Emily Johnson Executive Chef Michael Brown Head of Guest Services Awards & Recognition We are proud to have received numerous awards for our outstanding service and luxurious accommodations. Our commitment to excellence has been recognized by prestigious organizations worldwide. Best Luxury Hotel 2022 - World Travel Awards Top Casino Resort 2021 - Global Gaming Awards Excellence in Service 2020 - Hospitality Excellence Awards Guest Testimonials Don't just take our word for it. Hear what our guests have to say about their unforgettable experiences at Luxe Oasis Hotel. "The best hotel experience I've ever had. The staff were incredibly attentive and the amenities were top-notch." Sarah Williams "Luxe Oasis Hotel is truly a paradise. From the luxurious rooms to the exquisite dining options, everything was perfect." David Wilson "The spa was the perfect place to unwind. I can't wait to come back!" Jessica Lee Sustainability At Luxe Oasis Hotel, we are committed to sustainable practices that reduce our environmental footprint and promote a greener future. Our initiatives include energy-efficient technologies, waste reduction programs, and support for local communities. Partnerships & Social Responsibility We believe in giving back to the community. Through our partnerships and social responsibility programs, we support various local and global initiatives that aim to improve lives and promote social well-being. pages.casino: Casino - Luxe Oasis Hotel Age Verification Are you 18 years or older? Yes, I am 18 or older 18+ Home About Us Casino Contacts Casino Home | Casino Experience the thrill of gaming at Luxe Oasis Hotel's world-class casino. Our casino offers a wide range of games and entertainment options, ensuring a night of excitement and luxury for all our guests. Games Blackjack Try your hand at blackjack, one of the most popular casino games worldwide. Test your skills and strategy against the dealer in a thrilling game of 21. Roulette Feel the excitement as the roulette wheel spins. Bet on your lucky number or color and see if fortune favors you. Slot Machines Enjoy a variety of slot machines with different themes and jackpots. Spin the reels and try your luck at winning big. Poker Join a game of poker and challenge other players in Texas Hold'em, Omaha, and other popular poker variants. Loyalty Programs Join our exclusive loyalty programs and enjoy special benefits, rewards, and privileges. Our loyalty members receive personalized offers, invitations to special events, and much more. Events & Entertainment Our casino hosts a variety of events and entertainment options, from live music and performances to themed parties and tournaments. There's always something happening at Luxe Oasis Hotel's casino. Live Music Enjoy live music performances by talented artists and bands. Our casino features a vibrant atmosphere with great entertainment every night. Poker Tournaments Participate in our exciting poker tournaments and compete for big prizes. Whether you're a seasoned player or a newcomer, our tournaments offer a thrilling experience. Themed Parties Join us for our themed parties, featuring unique decorations, entertainment, and fun activities. Dress up and enjoy a night of celebration and excitement. Policies We prioritize the safety and enjoyment of our guests. Please review our casino policies to ensure a pleasant experience for everyone. Minimum age requirement for entry is 18 years. pages.index: Luxe Oasis Hotel - Luxury Hotel & Resort 18+ Home About Us Casino Contacts Welcome to Luxe Oasis Hotel Experience the Ultimate in Luxury and Excitement Order About Us Luxe Oasis Hotel offers an unparalleled experience in luxury and comfort. Exquisite accommodations, and exceptional services make us the premier destination for relaxation and excitement. Established in the heart of the city, Luxe Oasis Hotel has been a beacon of elegance and sophistication since its inception. Our hotel boasts a range of meticulously designed rooms and suites that cater to every need, ensuring a stay that is both comfortable and memorable. From the moment you step into our grand lobby, adorned with stunning marble floors and towering chandeliers, you are enveloped in an ambiance of refinement and luxury. At Luxe Oasis Hotel, we pride ourselves on providing top-notch amenities and services. Our guests can indulge in gourmet dining experiences at our on-site restaurants, unwind at our state-of-the-art spa and wellness center, or take a dip in our stunning outdoor pool. For those seeking excitement, ensuring that there is never a dull moment. Our dedicated staff is committed to ensuring that your stay with us exceeds your expectations. Whether you are here for business or pleasure, Luxe Oasis Hotel promises an experience that is both luxurious and unforgettable. More Rooms & Suites Discover the perfect room or suite for your stay. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Luxe Oasis Hotel 18+ Home About Us Casino Contacts Privacy Policy At Luxe Oasis Hotel, your privacy is our priority. This privacy policy details the methods we use to collect, utilize, and safeguard your personal information whenever you visit our website or stay at our hotel. Information We Collect We gather various types of information to enhance and deliver our services effectively. This includes: Personal Information: When you book a reservation, contact us, or check-in at our hotel, we collect personal details such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. Stay Information: We record details about your stay, including the dates of your visit, room preferences, and any special requests. Website Usage Data: We track data about your interactions with our website, such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and the duration of your visit. Feedback and Reviews: We collect any feedback or reviews you provide regarding our services. How We Use Your Information Your information is utilized for the following purposes: Service Delivery: To manage your reservations, process payments, and provide the services you request during your stay. Communication: To send booking confirmations, service updates, promotional offers, and respond to your inquiries. Personalization: To enhance your experience by remembering your preferences and tailoring our services accordingly. Improvement: To analyze website usage and feedback, allowing us to improve our services, website functionality, and customer satisfaction. Legal Compliance: To adhere to legal requirements and protect our rights and the rights of our guests. Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with: Service Providers: Third-party vendors who assist us in providing our services, such as payment processors, IT support, and marketing agencies. These providers are obligated to protect your information and use it solely for the purposes we specify. Legal Authorities: When required by law or in response to legal processes, we may disclose your information to law enforcement or other authorities. Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the new entity as part of the transaction. Data Security We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include encryption, firewalls, and secure data storage solutions. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information held by us. Additionally, you can object to the processing of your data or request restrictions on its use. To exercise these rights, please contact us at luxeoasishotel@gmail.com. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently gathered such data, we will take steps to delete it. International Transfers Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and that your information remains protected. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Any updates will be posted on this page with the effective date. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at: Email: luxeoasishotel@gmail.com Thank you for choosing Luxe Oasis Hotel. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a safe and enjoyable experience. Home About Us Casino Contacts Privacy policy | Terms and Conditions | Disclaimer We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Learn more Accept
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Luxe Oasis Hotel 18+ Home About Us Casino Contacts Terms and Conditions Welcome to Luxe Oasis Hotel's website. By accessing and using our website and services, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. 1. General Terms Luxe Oasis Hotel reserves the right to change these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our website and services constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms and conditions. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically. 2. Reservations and Payments All reservations are subject to availability and confirmation. We require valid payment information to secure your booking. By providing your payment details, you authorize us to charge the total amount of your reservation, including any applicable taxes and fees. Cancellations and modifications are subject to our cancellation policy, which may vary depending on the rate and dates of your reservation. 3. Check-in and Check-out Check-in time is from 3:00 PM, and check-out time is by 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Guests must present a valid government-issued ID and a credit card upon check-in. 4. Guest Conduct Guests are expected to conduct themselves in a respectful and responsible manner while on our premises. Any behavior deemed disruptive, abusive, or harmful to other guests, staff, or property may result in immediate eviction without a refund. Guests are responsible for any damage or loss caused during their stay. 5. Privacy and Data Protection We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for detailed information on how we collect, use, and safeguard your data. 6. Limitation of Liability Luxe Oasis Hotel is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or services. This includes, but is not limited to, loss of data, profits, or business opportunities. Our liability is limited to the fullest extent permitted by law. 7. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, images, logos, and trademarks, is the property of Luxe Oasis Hotel or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without our prior written consent. 8. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites for your convenience. We do not endorse or assume responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of these websites. You access third-party websites at your own risk. 9. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the country in which Luxe Oasis Hotel is located. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that country. 10. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us at: Email: luxeoasishotel@gmail.com Thank you for choosing Luxe Oasis Hotel. We look forward to welcoming you and providing an exceptional experience.
